entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
